cause.description:
L o v e is like a puzzle. When you're in l o v e, all the pieces fit but when your heart gets b r o k e n, it takes a while to get everything back together.
1. when you fall in love...dont give it up!
cause.mission: ' s u p p o r t ' t h e b . r. o . k . e . n h e a r t s .
cause.name: 'support' the b.r.o.k.e.n hearts.
